title: BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Corporation Announces Approval Of Acquisition By Clarke Inc.
text:
BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Corporation Announces Approval Of Acquisition By Clarke Inc.

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 25, 2019 18:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Corporation Announces Approval Of Acquisition By Clarke Inc. Sept 25 (Reuters) - Holloway Lodging Corp : * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORPORATION ANNOUNCES APPROVAL OF ACQUISITION BY CLARKE INC. * HOLLOWAY LODGING CORP - CO, CLARKE INC. EXPECT ARRANGEMENT TO CLOSE AND ASSUMPTION OF DEBENTURES TO OCCUR ON OR ABOUT SEPTEMBER 30, 2019

BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Corporation Announces Approval Of Acquisition By Clarke Inc.
description: BRIEF-Holloway Lodging Corporation Announces Approval Of Acquisition By Clarke Inc.
